ACAC.summary: Acies Acquisition Corp. is a blank check company. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Cayman Islands.

ACACU.summary: Acies Acquisition Corp. is a blank check company. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Cayman Islands.

ALUS.summary: Alussa Energy Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

ALUS-UN.summary: Alussa Energy Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

AOF.L.summary: Africa Opportunity Fund Limited is close ended balanced mutual fund launched and managed by Africa Opportunity Partners Limited. The fund invests in equity and fixed income markets of Africa. It seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in equity, debt, and other interests in both listed and unlisted assets. Africa Opportunity Fund Limited was formed on July 26, 2007 and is domiciled in Cayman Islands.

AVAN.summary: Avanti Acquisition Corp. intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

AVAN-UN.summary: Avanti Acquisition Corp. intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

BTAQ.summary: Burgundy Technology Acquisition Corporation intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It focuses on public and private opportunities in the technology sector, primarily companies in enterprise software or technology-enabled services. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.

BTAQU.summary: Burgundy Technology Acquisition Corporation intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It focuses on public and private opportunities in the technology sector, primarily companies in enterprise software or technology-enabled services. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.

CWNOF.summary: Chineseworldnet.com Inc. does not have significant operations. It intends to acquire or invest in other business opportunities. Previously, it was engaged in financial Web portal, investor relations and public relations, conference, and financial content and information distribution businesses. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.

GLRE.summary: Greenlight Capital Re, Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates as a property and casualty reinsurer worldwide. The company offers various property reinsurance products and services, including automobile physical damage; personal lines, such as homeowners' insurance; and commercial lines. It also provides casualty reinsurance products and services comprising general liability, motor liability, professional liability, and worker's compensation; and accident and health, mortgage insurance, surety, trade credit, marine, aviation, crop, energy, cyber, and terrorism products. The company markets its products through reinsurance brokers. Greenlight Capital Re, Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

IMPX.summary: AEA-Bridges Impact Corp. intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with a business or entity. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

IMPX-UN.summary: AEA-Bridges Impact Corp. intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with a business or entity. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

MAFL.L.summary: Mineral & Financial Investments Limited, an investment company, invests in natural resources, minerals, metals, and oil and gas projects in the Cayman Islands. Mineral & Financial Investments Limited is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.

OXBR.summary: Oxbridge Re Holdings Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides specialty property and casualty reinsurance solutions. It focuses on underwriting fully-collateralized reinsurance contracts primarily for property and casualty insurance companies in the Gulf Coast region of the United States. The company distributes its products and solutions through reinsurance brokers. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in George Town, the Cayman Islands.

PAX.summary: Patria Investments Limited operates as a private market investment firm focused on investing in Latin America. It offers asset management services to investors focusing on private equity funds, infrastructure development funds, co-investments funds, constructivist equity funds, and real estate and credit funds. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

VYGG.summary: Vy Global Growth intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses in the financial, technology, and business services sectors. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

VYGG-UN.summary: Vy Global Growth intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses in the financial, technology, and business services sectors. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
